header_2: South Korea. in Bird flu has been found at a farm in Nghe An province where 300 ducks have died. H5N1 has been detected, according to Department of Animal Health officials. This outbreak follows a recent rash of bird flu cases near Ho Chi Minh City and Nghe An is the third province to be affected since the beginning of September.
content_2: Bird flu has been reported at a duck farm in Yesan City, 130 km south of Seoul. Athough highly pathogenic H5N1 had been suspected, low pathogenic avian influenza H5N2 has been identified from samples taken from ducks on the farm.

This outbreak follows a recent rash of bird flu cases near Ho Chi Minh City and Nghe An is the third province to be affected since the beginning of September.
